name: Gnome Invaders
description:
They're relentless. They're ruthless. They're also quite fashionable. Get ready for an invasion like you've never seen before! Gnomes of all shapes and sizes are storming the globe with their sights set on one thing: a rare and precious flower.

As a new employee of an extermination company, it's your job to help protect these flowers from the overwhelming onslaught. Equipped with your trusty battle station, you'll have access to dozens of unique, sophisticated weaponry to help get the job done. Those weapons will be crucial to your success, as you'll be traveling to many different locations along your adventure, each with its own hazards.

In between contracts you should head over to the arena for some friendly competition in our fun and unique multiplayer battles. The farther you can progress in the arena, the bigger and better the rewards you can earn are.

~~~ CRAZY WEAPONS
Gather and master up to 40 unique weapons - from bombs and drones to blizzards and even meteor showers!

~~~ COOL LOCATIONS
Travel to over a hundred locations across a dozen different regions like deserts and graveyards!

~~~ UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER
Battle other exterminators in a fight for survival in the arena to earn valuable rewards!

~~~ FABLED GAUNTLET
See how far you can climb The Gauntlet with a limited set of weapons at your disposal!

~~~ LOTTERY BOARD
Gather tickets and test your luck at our special lottery board. There are lots of prizes to be won!


*Latest update fixes an error with purchasable items in the shop.
